title: Cross my heart
creator_credit: David Swann, Andrew Wiseman, Open Channel Productions and Jocelyn Moorhouse
brief_description: Two women attending a friend’s funeral who died from cancer vow to quit smoking, cold turkey. There are obstacles in their way however, including a sister who has just split up with her partner, her son in tow. They instil a no smoking policy in the house with penalties for those who break the rules. Features salient points about the ill effects of smoking and the side effects you can expect when quitting. Cast includes: Marilyn O’Donnell, Parthena Amanatidis, Tamasin Ramsay, Brian Nankervis.
